title: Identify which mixture is a buffer solution

content.prompt:
Mixtures that would be considered buffers include which of the following?

I. 0.10 M HCl + 0.10 M NaCl

II. 0.10 M HF + 0.10 M NaF

III. 0.10 M HBr + 0.10 M NaBr

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
